relatedRecords.name: flatMap(Oslo) 2020
relatedRecords.description: flatMap(Oslo) is a functional programming conference with focus on strongly typed languages. The next conference will be on May 14th and 15th 2020 in Oslo, Norway.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit - London
relatedRecords.description: Comsum is the Community Summit for AWS. Multi track events with talks and workshops from AWS Community Heroes and Community Members. After the talks networking with 50 classic arcade cabinets, great food and drink.

relatedRecords.name: UXDX
relatedRecords.description: UXDX brings together UX, Design, Dev and Product to learn how to shift from delivering projects to working as cross-functional teams that build products customers actually want. Come and join us on 8 - 9 October, 2020 in Dublin to learn more.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day Nordics 2020
relatedRecords.description: The AWS Community Day is a free full day event for AWS users organized by the community. Once a year all AWS users come together to network, learn from each other and get inspired. At this event, there will be no vendor talks, no partner talks, no sponsored talks.
